item.title: TSM
item.description: score:-33 Chances: Being recognized as a top stock for investors to buy. Positive analyst sentiment and price target upgrades. Expansion of growth abroad and potential overseas engagement. Rise of demand for AI technology and semiconductor solutions. Partnerships and advancements in chip packaging technology.

item.title: ON
item.description: score:27 Chances: ON Semiconductor Corp. (ON) could benefit from a bullish trendline that might drive its stock price closer to record highs. The auto and industrial chip sector’s potential for accelerating growth and profit expansion in the coming year could positively impact ON Semiconductor.

item.title: QCOM
item.description: score:1004 Chances: Qualcomm’s support for new iPhone models suggests improved chip volumes for the current quarter. Positive results from tech giants’ quarterly reports despite some being muted. Formation of a new company by chipmakers, including Qualcomm, to develop RISC-V technology. Qualcomm’s daily gain and EPS performance raise questions about its valuation and potential for investors.
